entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SignalR Core Nuget Package is deprecated? #42601
  • Address dotnet-user-jwts prebuilt in source-build #42599
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Rendering.WebAssemblyRenderer[100] Unhandled exception rendering component: The given key was not present in the dictionary. #42598
  • Support disabling auto-registering auth middlewares in WAB #42596
    7.0-preview7
  • ProtectedLocalStorage cannot be mocked for unit tests #42594
  • Expose RoutePatternFactory.Combine #42593
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add APIs to make it possible for users of RouteEndpointBuilder to use filters #42592
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Rename filter extension methods and type name to be more agnostic #42589

Closed

  • Multiple login page for redirect #42531
    Discussions
  • NuGet: Authentication packages versioning #42566
  • Blazor: support webpack module federation flow #42486
  • Can't open multiple windows from blazor server. #42570
  • Add `ObjectHttpResult` likes the `ObjectResult` #41470
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Clean up output spew when creating token and secret for the first time #42474
    7.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix up signing key handling in user-jwts and runtime #42603
    area-commandlinetools
  • Retry flaky `AttributeRouting_RouteNameTokenReplace_Reachable` #42602
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix Blazor WebView Streaming Race Condition #42600
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-jsinterop, 7.0-preview7
  • Route tooling #42597
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add utf8 text overloads for creating results #42595
    area-runtime
  • Simplify and optimize async parameters in RequestDelegateFactory #42588
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Fix newtonsoft alerts #42478
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.8
  • Delete deprecated AzureAD identity UI packages #42546
    area-identity, 7.0-preview7
  • !fixup! Correct condition in localization.yml #42590
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7
  • Include DefaultHttpContext.HttpContext for diagnostic activities #42591
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `548b13d` to `96f5142` #42529
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Remove more unused Docker files #42247
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.8 #42583
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Add message type resolver #42428
    area-grpc, 7.0-preview7
  • Reduce console spew when creating secrets in user-jwts #42542
    area-commandlinetools, 7.0-preview7
  • Slightly clean up template README #42587
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `548b13d` to `96f5142` #42528
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Update newtonsoft.json dependency #42377
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/3.1] Remove old unused Docker files #42246
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/2.1] Remove old unused Docker files #42245
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Remove support for setting default scheme from user-jwts #42578
    area-web-frameworks, feature-authentication, 7.0-preview7

Updated

  • CreatedResult should accept null location #42576
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Improve Default Blazor WebAssembly Loading Experience #42548
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview7
  • Remove Authentication property from WebApplicationBuilder and fix up middleware auto-registration #42585
    area-web-frameworks, feature-authentication
  • Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • AuthN: Use single scheme as DefaultScheme #42497
    breaking-change, area-security
  • Remove Pseudo-Headers From Public API #42496
    area-runtime
  • Adding ProblemDetailsService #42384
    area-web-frameworks
  • Trim Microsoft.AspNetCore #42555
    area-runtime
  • Make RateLimitingMiddleware endpoint aware #42417
    area-runtime
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1863737 #42551
    area-mvc
  • Default to 3 local retries #40503
    area-infrastructure
  • [Infrastructure] Update SDK version #42571
    area-infrastructure
  • macOS dev-certs overhaul #42251
    area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, blog-candidate
  • Make route handler filters work for MVC controllers #42557
    area-mvc
  • Remove Auth validation when Form File upload #42586
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Support state in NavigationManager #42534
    area-blazor
  • Add gRPC trimming end-to-end test #42572
    area-grpc
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
